lead_paragraph: Pizzas are off the menu for Manchester City players as manager Pep Guardiola has imposed strict weight parameters on the squad breaching which will result in training bans, left back Gael Clichy has said.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola Ticks Pizza Off City Menu in Weight Crackdown
headline.main: Guardiola Ticks Pizza Off City Menu in Weight Crackdown

snippet: Pizzas are off the menu for Manchester City players as manager Pep Guardiola has imposed strict weight parameters on the squad breaching which will result in training bans, left back Gael Clichy has said....
